content: Once the golden spiked ball has flown off the edge of the Ashen Pass, return to The Emerald Hall. Go past the altar and up the path toward the Ashen Pass. Once you've climbed the first set of stairs, you'll see the golden ball wedged into a rock next to the Flame Rhino Master.  Go all the way up to it and you'll be able to take the Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top Spirit from inside.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Field_of_Fire_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Field of Fire Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Cooling Slope' and the sub-subsection 'Don't Miss This Spirit!'.
The content is as follows:
Once the golden spiked ball has flown off the edge of the Ashen Pass, return to The Emerald Hall. Go past the altar and up the path toward the Ashen Pass. Once you've climbed the first set of stairs, you'll see the golden ball wedged into a rock next to the Flame Rhino Master.  Go all the way up to it and you'll be able to take the Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top Spirit from inside.
